Plot: Pat Tillman never thought of himself as a hero. His choice to leave a multimillion-dollar football contract and join the military wasn't done for any reason other than he felt it was the ...
Title: The Tillman Story
Actors: Josh Brolin, Pat Tillman, Mary Tillman, Russell Baer
tomatoConsensus: Passionate, angry, and insightful, The Tillman Story offers a revealing portrait of its subject's inspiring life and untimely death.
